title: Image with Overlay Buttons
shortDescription: This sample displays images with action buttons overlaid on the bottom of each image in a compact tile format.
longDescription: This sample displays images with action buttons overlaid on the bottom of each image in a compact tile format.

thumbnails.alt: Image tiles with overlay buttons showing glass effect styling

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
